titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Microfilmed Matthew Vassar Papers, 1797-1890
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Laura Streett

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Jennifer Palmentiero July 2006

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Papers created by and relating to Matthew Vassar, founder of Vassar College, on microfilm.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: See the Guide to the Matthew Vassar Papers for a complete biographical note.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

altformavail.head: Other Formats
altformavail.p: The originals of Matthew Vassar Papers are also available. See the Guide to the Matthew Vassar Papers.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Matthew Vassar Papers, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged in 8 volumes on 10 reels of microfilm.

did.unittitle: Includes contents of folders 226, 227, 771, and memoranda, remarks
Documents relating to Matthew Vassar’s brewery
Documents relating to Matthew Vassar’s brewery
Day Book of Vassar Brewery (between folders 723 and 724)
Folder 811, Expense account of trip to Europe
Matthew Vassar, Jr., private account book
Matthew Vassar, & Co.: Miscellaneous Ledger (between folders 723 and 724)
